definition: king or monarch/best or strongest of its type/grand/great

prefix used before the surname of a person or a numeral indicating the order of birth of the children in a family or to indicate affection or familiarity/old (of people)/venerable (person)/experienced/of long standing/always/all the time/of the past/very/outdated/(of meat etc) tough
surname Ji/abbr. for Jilin Province 吉林省[Ji2 lin2 Sheng3]

sentences.english: Finally, choose red tin Wanglaoji brand for the case studies.
sentences.chinese: 最後，選擇紅罐王老吉的品牌傳播進行了案例分析。

sentences.english: The Wanglaoji (WLJ) JV is expected to recover stably.
sentences.chinese: 預計王老吉合資公司將穩定地恢復。

definition: Yanshou county in Harbin 哈爾濱|哈尔滨[Ha1 er3 bin1], Heilongjiang/to extend life
Maotai town in Renhuai county, Guizhou/Maotai liquor 茅臺酒|茅台酒

pinyin: Ke3 kou3 Ke3 le4 Gong1 si1

definition: to make life longer/to promise longevity/(this product will) extend your life
King-to Nin Jiom, or just Nin Jiom, manufacturer of 枇杷膏[pi2 pa2 gao1] cough medicine
